oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Benefit of Sulfate fertilisation in Alfalfa - and clover-grass mixtures in organic farming
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Becker, Konstantin
Riffel, Alexandra
Fischinger, Stephanie Anastasia
Leithold, G端nter
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Composting and manuring
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The study shows the effect of sulfur (S) fertilization of an alfalfa clover-grass mixture, cultivated on the experimental farm Gladbachhof. Induced by the S fertilization the yield and N and S concentration were positiv influenced.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Becker, Konstantin; Riffel, Alexandra; Fischinger, Stephanie Anastasia and Leithold, G端nter (2014) Benefit of Sulfate fertilisation in Alfalfa - and clover-grass mixtures in organic farming. In: Rahmann, G. and Aksoy, U. (Eds.) Building Organic Bridges, Johann Heinrich von Th端nen-Institut, Braunschweig, Germany, 2, Thuenen Report, no. 20, pp. 535-538.
